thread.title: Macrium Launch v6.1 Free for All v6.0 Customers
thread.title_full: Macrium Launch v6.1 Free for All v6.0 Customers - PR.com

author: PR.com
title: Macrium Launch v6.1 Free for All v6.0 Customers
text:
Macrium Launch v6.1 Free for All v6.0 Customers
Macrium are pleased to announce their latest version 6.1 of Reflect is now available. This new feature rich release is available free to all v6.0 customers.
Manchester, United Kingdom, October 15, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Macrium Software are proud to announce the latest version of their popular backup and DR software, Macrium Reflect, is now available. This major mid-cycle release incorporates many enhancements and new features.
These new features include:
Delta Incremental Indexes which optimises the size of each index associated with incremental backups by only tracking changed blocks. This further improves the backup and recovery speeds and reduces the amount of storage required to store backups.
Macrium continue to grow their international customer base and they now have German language support available. Over the coming months, there will be regular releases in other new languages.
Macrium Reflect now also supports Windows PE 10. This is especially important as with the recent release of Windows 10, PE 10 is now the default PE option for installations on Windows 8, 8.1, 10, Server 2012, 2012R2.
Macrium is proud to continue the tradition of releasing great products with features that address the complex needs of the IT Technician and Administrator as well as their large consumer base. Reflect v6.1 is available free to all v6.0 customers, simply visit Macriumâ€™s website and the knowledge base for more information on how to upgrade.
